General.Name: Hongda High-Tech Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. engages in warp-knitting, medical device, trading, and financial investment businesses in China. It offers automotive interior fabrics, and clothing fabrics. The company also provides medical device products for liver, gallbladder, spleen, kidney, pancreas, heart, thyroid, breast, bladder, uterus attachment, and other organs. It exports its products to the United States, Germany, Japan, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Hongda Warp Knitting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. in August 2010. Hongda High-Tech Holding Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Haining, China.
